definition: to speak harshly but without any bad intent (idiom)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Don't take any of it to heart – her bark is worse than her bite.
sentences.chinese: 她是個有口無心的人，你不要太計較。
